keywords: Feedback Hub Always Save Diagnostics Locally
description: Diagnostic files created when a feedback is filed in the Feedback Hub app will always be saved locally. If this policy is not present or set to false, users will be presented with the option to save locally. The default is to not save locally.
name: FeedbackHubAlwaysSaveDiagnosticsLocally
displayName: Feedback Hub Always Save Diagnostics Locally

options.description: False. The Feedback Hub will not always save a local copy of diagnostics that may be created when a feedback is submitted. The user will have the option to do so.
options.name: False. The Feedback Hub will not always save a local copy of diagnostics that may be created when a feedback is submitted. The user will have the option to do so.
options.displayName: False. The Feedback Hub will not always save a local copy of diagnostics that may be created when a feedback is submitted. The user will have the option to do so.

options.description: True. The Feedback Hub should always save a local copy of diagnostics that may be created when a feedback is submitted.
options.name: True. The Feedback Hub should always save a local copy of diagnostics that may be created when a feedback is submitted.
options.displayName: True. The Feedback Hub should always save a local copy of diagnostics that may be created when a feedback is submitted.
